mapper.sql: ur.id as "understanding.id", ur.student_id as "understanding.studentId", ur.upload_date as "understanding.uploadDate", ur.year as "understanding.year", ur.title_id as "understanding.titleId", ur.pass_flag as "understanding.passFlag", ur.uploadFile as "understanding.uploadFile", ur.uploadPath as "understanding.uploadPath", ur.uploadFileOldName as "understanding.uploadFileOldName", ur.teacher_id as "understanding.teacherId", ur.teacher_advise as "understanding.teacherAdvise", u.name as "user.name", es.node as "user.student.node", gt.title as "user.student.titleName"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = ur.student_id LEFT JOIN expand_student es on es.s_id = ur.student_id LEFT JOIN graduation_title gt on gt.id = es.title_id
mapper.update: UPDATE expand_student SET step_3 = #{STEP_FLAG_PASS,jdbcType=INTEGER},step_now = #{STEP_NOW_4,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE s_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
